title: PM chairs meeting of National Coordination Committee on COVID-19
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 13 (APP):Prime Minister Imran Khan on Monday chaired the meeting of National Coordination Committee (NCC) on COVID-19 and discussed the situation arising in the wake of coronavirus.
The meeting reviewed progress in controlling the spread of COVID-19 in the
country and discussed the strategy to minimize the impact of the challenge.
